New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi became the fastest Pakistani to reach 100 ODI wickets
Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman scored 81 runs, Abdullah Shafique was trapped in front of the stumps by Najmul Hossain Shanto
Babar Azam was caught by Mehidy Hasan Miraz at long-on for 9 runs
Fakhar Zaman was caught by Towhid Hridoy at deep mid-wicket fence for 81 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan's express pace battery, led by Shaheen Shah Afridi, was expected to trouble the Bangladeshi top order
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan expressed disappointment with the batting performance, crediting Pakistan for their bowling and batting in the first 10 overs
Fakhar Zaman expressed his happiness with his 50 on comeback, attributing it to his hard work and practice
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fakhar Zaman and Abdullah Shafique starred in Pakistan's win
Pakistan's net run rate is expected to boost with this win
